title: Replenish a Pick Face
description: A forward picking location for a popular item is running low. The system must generate a task to replenish it from bulk storage.

tasks.description: The system detects that the quantity in a primary pick location has dropped below its minimum level.
tasks.expected_outcome: A replenishment alert is automatically triggered.

tasks.description: The system generates a replenishment task, directing an operator to a bulk storage location with the same item.
tasks.expected_outcome: A task is created with 'from' and 'to' locations.

tasks.description: An operator accepts the task, moves a pallet from bulk to the pick face, and confirms completion.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator completes the task, and the system shows the pick face inventory has been increased.
